author: kpedro88
body:
#### PR description:

Addresses #49563. The final set of removals is:
* Detectors: D95, D96, D98, D99, D100, D101, D102, D103, D105, D106, D107, D108, D109, D116, D117, D118, D119
* Tracker: T31, T32, T33, T34
    * remove from README: T15, T21, T24, T25, T26, T30
* Calorimeter: C17, C21, C23, C24
    * remove from README: C9, C10, C11, C13, C14, C15, C16
* Muon system: M13
    * remove from README: M4, M6, M7, M8, M9, M10, M11, M12
* MTD: I16, I19
    * remove from README: I10, I11, I12, I13, I14, I15
* Common:
    * remove from README: O4, O5, O6, O7, O8
* Forward:
    * remove from README: F2, F3, F4, F5, F6, F7

#### PR validation:

Geometry unit tests pass. runTheMatrix.py has the correct workflow numbers for the trained geometries.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, not intended to be backported.
title: Phase 2 geometry deprecation
